name: Shuffle
description: Shroud yourself in mist to gain Major Evasion, decreasing damage from area attacks by 20% for 20 seconds.  Each piece of Medium Armor worn removes and grants immunity to snares and immobilizations for 1 second.
descHeader: Requires 5 pieces of medium armor equipped
effectLines: Each piece of Medium Armor worn removes and grants immunity to snares and immobilizations.
rawDescription:
